snippet.title: Watch This Before The Stand Begins
snippet.description:
Stephen King wrote the post-apocalyptic novel The Stand in 1978, and its story is still as relevant today as it was back then. It is why Stephen King fans were delighted at the announcement that the epic novel will return to the small screen in the form of a miniseries.

The series is bringing together an all-star cast that will include the acting talents of Whoopi Goldberg, Alexander Skarsgard, James Marsden, and Amber Heard.

Before you get ready to embark on the thrilling and suspenseful binge-fest that is The Stand, here is your guide to watching this epic Stephen King tale.

#StephenKing #TVShow #Book

Exciting cast | 0:00
The story | 1:21
The '90s version | 2:16
A new ending | 3:31
Who's behind the camera? | 4:18
